title: PA-21-02: Deadlines and Procedures for Annual Public Financial Disclosure Reports of Executive Branch Employees (2021 Filing Cycle)
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/FD50A5E9530BA345852586BF005DC95B/$FILE/PA-21-02 2021 Annual Public Financial Disclosure Report Deadlines.pdf?open
summary: This Program Advisory provides filing deadlines for the public financial disclosure reports of executive branch employees and procedures for the reports agencies are required to transmit to the U.S. Office of Government Ethics.
